fn.p: Note: The UK Public Health Rapid Support Team is funded by the United Kingdom Department of Health and Social Care. The views expressed in this publication are those of the authors and not necessarilythose of the National Health System, the National Institute for Health Research, the Department of Health and Social Care, or the U.S. National Institutes of Health, Department of Health and Human Services.
